description: Thick apple slices with a popsicle stick, dipped in chocolate then drizzled with caramel and topped with pecans.
ingredients: [{"name": "Fuji apples", "units": "very large", "amount": 2}, {"name": "semi-sweet chocolate chips", "units": "cups", "amount": 3.5}, {"name": "coconut oil", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "caramels", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "Chopped pecans", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.5}]
instructions: Slice apples into Â½" pieces. Make a little slit in the bottom of each apple slice to insert a popsicle stick. Melt chocolate chips in the microwave for about 2 minutes, stirring in coconut oil until smooth. Dip apple slices in chocolate and place on a parchment lined cookie sheet. Melt caramels in the microwave and drizzle over chocolate, then sprinkle with nuts. Refrigerate for about 1 hour. Serve and enjoy immediately.
notes: Apples are best the first day. Store in refrigerator.
